meanings.definition: Relating to or characteristic of a soloist.
meanings.sent1: Her soloistic performance captivated the audience.
meanings.sent2: The singer's soloistic talent shone during the concert.
meanings.sent3: The cat's soloistic behavior at dinner time was amusing.
meanings.sent4: The soloistic nature of the painting made it stand out in the gallery.
meanings.sent5: The soloistic melody lingered in the air long after the music stopped.

meanings.definition: In a soloistic manner or style.
